description: Hello there! ðŸ‘‹ I'm your friendly Discord Bot, designed to assist you with expert knowledge and answers based on your uploaded documents. Whether you have technical queries, need insights on specific topics, or just want to explore new information, I'm here to help. Just upload your document, ask your question, and I'll do my best to provide you with a precise and informative response. Let's make learning and information gathering easy and fun!

upload.description: Upload a document to the bot

channel.description: Enable/Disable the bot in the current channel.
channel.button-above-message: Enable or disable the bot for this channel:
